innovation_management_details.development_implementation_desc: Crafting and executing innovation strategies to meet changing industry demands.
innovation_management_details.cooperation_networking_desc: Facilitating multi-actor cooperation to bring research into practical application.
innovation_management_details.market_analysis_desc: Conducting thorough market analyses to position new technologies optimally.
innovation_management_details.success_impact_analysis_desc: Measuring the success and impact of transfer activities.

knowledge_transfer_details.training_workshops_desc: Customized training sessions and workshops designed to equip your team with the latest knowledge and skills.
knowledge_transfer_details.strategic_planning_desc: Crafting strategies to effectively manage and disseminate knowledge within your organization.
knowledge_transfer_details.knowledge_management_systems_desc: Implementing advanced systems to capture, store, and share critical information.
knowledge_transfer_details.identification_evaluation_transfer_poten: Identification and Evaluation of Transfer Potentials
Screening and market analysis to identify and evaluate transfer potentials.

technology_transfer_details.innovation_scouting_desc: Identifying cutting-edge technologies that can propel your business forward.
technology_transfer_details.technology_assessment_desc: Evaluating the feasibility and potential impact of new technologies.
technology_transfer_details.licensing_ip_management_desc: Navigating the complexities of intellectual property to maximize value and ensure compliance.
technology_transfer_details.research_related_spin_offs_desc: Assisting in planning, foundation, market entry, and growth of research-related spin-offs.
